00030 class cGate;

00038 class SIM_API cChannel : public cComponent //implies noncopyable
00039 {
00040   protected:
00041     cGate *srcgatep; // gate the channel is attached to
00042     int connId;      // for cChannel::getProperties(); usually the NED connection element's id
00043 
00044   public:
00045     // internal: called from cGate
00046     void setSourceGate(cGate *g) {srcgatep=g;}
00047 
00048     // internal: sets/gets connId
00049     void setConnectionId(int id) {connId = id;}
00050     int getConnectionId() {return connId;}
00051 
00052     // internal: called from callInitialize(). Does one stage for this
00053     // channel, and returns true if there are more stages to do
00054     virtual bool initializeChannel(int stage);
00055 
00056     // internal: overridden to perform additional checks
00057     virtual void finalizeParameters();
00058 
00059   public:
00064     struct result_t
00065     {
00066         result_t() : delay(SIMTIME_ZERO), duration(SIMTIME_ZERO), discard(false) {}
00067         simtime_t delay;     
00068         simtime_t duration;  
00069         bool discard;        
00070     };
00071 
00075     class MessageSentSignalValue : public cITimestampedValue, public cObject
00076     {
00077       public:
00078         simtime_t timestamp;
00079         cMessage *msg;
00080         result_t *result;
00081       public:
00083         MessageSentSignalValue(simtime_t_cref t, cMessage *m, result_t *r) {timestamp=t; msg=m; result=r;}
00084 
00088         virtual simtime_t_cref getTimestamp(simsignal_t signalID) const {return timestamp;}
00089 
00091         virtual Type getValueType(simsignal_t signalID) const {return OBJECT;}
00092 
00094         virtual cObject *objectValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {return msg;}
00096 
00098         cMessage *getMessage() const {return msg;}
00099 
00101         result_t *getChannelResult() const {return result;}
00102 
00105         virtual long longValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {error(); return 0;}
00106         virtual unsigned long unsignedLongValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {error(); return 0;}
00107         virtual double doubleValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {error(); return 0;}
00108         virtual SimTime simtimeValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {error(); return timestamp;}
00109         virtual const char *stringValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {error(); return NULL;}
00110         void error() const;
00112     };
00113 
00114   public:
00120     explicit cChannel(const char *name=NULL);
00121 
00125     virtual ~cChannel();
00127 
00134     virtual std::string info() const;
00135 
00140     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00141 
00145     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00146 
00150     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00152 
00163     virtual void callInitialize();
00164 
00169     virtual bool callInitialize(int stage);
00170 
00174     virtual void callFinish();
00176 
00186     virtual cModule *getParentModule() const;
00187 
00191     cChannelType *getChannelType() const  {return (cChannelType *)getComponentType();}
00192 
00197     virtual cProperties *getProperties() const;
00198 
00202     cGate *getSourceGate() const  {return srcgatep;}
00203 
00210     virtual bool isTransmissionChannel() const = 0;
00212 
00239     virtual void processMessage(cMessage *msg, simtime_t t, result_t& result) = 0;
00240 
00251     virtual double getNominalDatarate() const = 0;
00252 
00275     virtual simtime_t calculateDuration(cMessage *msg) const = 0;
00276 
00285     virtual simtime_t getTransmissionFinishTime() const = 0;
00286 
00294     virtual bool isBusy() const;
00295 
00314     virtual void forceTransmissionFinishTime(simtime_t t) = 0;
00316 };

00325 class SIM_API cIdealChannel : public cChannel //implies noncopyable
00326 {
00327   public:
00335     explicit cIdealChannel(const char *name=NULL) : cChannel(name) {}
00336 
00340     virtual ~cIdealChannel() {}
00341 
00346     static cIdealChannel *create(const char *name);
00348 
00354     virtual void processMessage(cMessage *msg, simtime_t t, result_t& result) {}
00355 
00359     virtual double getNominalDatarate() const {return 0;}
00360 
00364     virtual bool isTransmissionChannel() const {return false;}
00365 
00369     virtual simtime_t calculateDuration(cMessage *msg) const {return SIMTIME_ZERO;}
00370 
00374     virtual simtime_t getTransmissionFinishTime() const {return SIMTIME_ZERO;}
00375 
00379     virtual bool isBusy() const {return false;}
00380 
00384     virtual void forceTransmissionFinishTime(simtime_t t) {}
00386 };
